mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, printname, printtype, sortno, printurl, organization
mapper.insert: insert into KQDS_PRINT_SET (SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, printname, printtype, sortno, printurl, organization) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into KQDS_PRINT_SET
SEQ_ID,
createuser,
createtime,
printname,
printtype,
sortno,
printurl,
organization,

mapper.update:
update KQDS_PRINT_SET
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
printname = #{printname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
printtype = #{printtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
printurl = #{printurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_PRINT_SET set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, printname = #{printname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, printtype = #{printtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, printurl = #{printurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tc.seq_id, tc.printname, tc.printtype, tc.sortno, tc.printurl, tc.organization, tc.createuser, p.user_name as createusername, tc.createtime from KQDS_PRINT_SET tc LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON p on tc.createuser = p.seq_id where 1=1 and tc.organization = #{organization} ORDER BY tc.createtime
